attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop conning the public, we know most of the cost of road fuel is tax, and we know your inflation figure is a con. Stop lying, let's have a government that has the peoples intetrests at heart. Not for the politions own gain.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
